children.value: Hey, I'm Matt Mayfield üëãüèø
I am a software developer creating open source projects and writing about modern JavaScript, Node.js, and development.
I design software that solves problems that the company I work for didn't know they had, and writing documentation on it all.
If you enjoy my content, support me buy fueling my coffee addiction!
Documenting my journey is not only the primary goal of this site, but an essential part of supporting the community.
Give easy to understand Javascript concepts that I personally wish I had when starting my journey as a developer
NO ADVERTISEMENTS, NO SCAMS, NO BULLSHIT! But you can always support me by
Entirely built using GatsbyJS! This also allows me to leverage GatsbyJS's huge ecosystem of plugins and tools. You can learn more about
. I personally highly recommend...My own guide coming soon!

: MDX is an authorable format that lets you seamlessly write JSX in your Markdown documents. You can import components, such as interactive charts or alerts, and embed them within your content. This makes writing long-form content with components a blast üöÄ.
Open the source code and start editing!
Click the edit page on the top right corner to make changes as see fit through a pull request on Github!
Added a dark mode toggle because...dark mode.
Quickly find what you are looking for within the site with the search engine located in the side nav.
Simple and elegant are two things that I wanted for this site. Not too many bells and whistles.
A quick look at the top-level files and directories.
